MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L24 postcode area of Speke, affecting properties in Oglet  Lane and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  10:39 AM. Our engineers have arrived at the local area and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on our overhead line network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 1:30 PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:36 AM  on 6th November 2020..
